TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeNodeMouseClickEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件以及如何使用 。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and how to use the . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含名为 `treeView1`的 的 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`. 用运行该示例的系统的 `c:\` 目录中的文件名称填充 `treeView1`，并将 `treeView1` 的 事件与此示例中的 `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` 方法相关联。Populate `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example.
